insert into ltc (ltc_id, ltc_level, ltc_yield, day_yield, vitality_yield, freeze_yield, vtb_price, update_user, update_time) values (#{ltcId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ltcLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ltcYield,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dayYield,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{vitalityYield,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{freezeYield,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{vtbPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update ltc
ltc_level = #{ltcLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ltc_yield = #{ltcYield,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
day_yield = #{dayYield,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
vitality_yield = #{vitalityYield,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
freeze_yield = #{freezeYield,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
vtb_price = #{vtbPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ltc_id = #{ltcId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ltc set ltc_level = #{ltcLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ltc_yield = #{ltcYield,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, day_yield = #{dayYield,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, vitality_yield = #{vitalityYield,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, freeze_yield = #{freezeYield,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, vtb_price = #{vtbPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ltc_id = #{ltcId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
